00053 WorldMap::WorldMap(QWidget* widget)
00054         :QWidget(widget), m_rightAscension( 0 ), m_declination( 0 ), m_azimuth( 0 ), m_zenith( 0 )
00055         //m_hourAngle( 0 ), m_rightAscension( 0 ), m_declination( 0 ), m_azimuth( 0 ), m_zenith( 0 )
00056 {
00057         m_gray = new Image(":/icons/WorldMapGray.BMP");
00058         m_map.load( ":/icons/mundo.BMP" );
00059         m_sun.load( ":/icons/sunIcon.png" );
00060         m_sun = m_sun.scaledToWidth( 15 );
00061         
00062 }

00066

00069 void WorldMap::mouseMoveEvent( QMouseEvent* e)
00070 {
00071         int x=e->x();
00072         int y=e->y();
00073 
00074         //Change tool tip       
00075         QString country = m_gray->country( x, y );
00076         if ( !( country == "EMPTY" ) )  QToolTip::showText( e->globalPos(), country );
00077         else    QToolTip::showText( e->globalPos(), "" );
00078         
00079 }
00080 
00081 void WorldMap::LocalLongitudeChanged( double longitude )
00082 {
00083         m_longitude = longitude;
00084 }
00085 
00086 void WorldMap::SunChanged( cSunCoordinates coordinates )
00087 {
00088         int width = m_map.width();
00089         int height = m_map.height();
00090          
00091 
00092         
00093         m_rightAscension = coordinates.dRightAscension;  
00094         m_declination = coordinates.dDeclination;
00095         
00096         double hourAngle = coordinates.dHourAngle;
00097         int division = (int ) ( ( hourAngle - m_longitude * tgc::Degree )/ tgc::TwoPi );
00098         double remainPart = (hourAngle - m_longitude * tgc::Degree ) - ( division * tgc::TwoPi );
00099         m_hourAngle = remainPart;
00100         
00101         m_azimuth = coordinates.dAzimuth;
00102         m_zenith = coordinates.dZenithAngle;
00103         
00104         double sx = cos( m_declination ) * cos( m_hourAngle );
00105         double sy = -cos( m_declination) * sin( m_hourAngle );
00106         double sz = sin( m_declination );
00107 
00108         if ( sz == 0 ) sz = 0.0000000000001;
00109         
00110         m_points.clear();
00111         
00112         for( int x = 0; x < width; x++ )
00113         {
00114                 double lon = ( ( x * tgc::TwoPi ) / width ) - tgc::Pi;
00115                 double lat = atan( - ( sx * cos( lon ) + sy * sin( lon )  ) / sz );
00116                 //double y = ( lat + tgc::Pi/ 2) * height / tgc::Pi;
00117                 double y = ( height/ 2 ) - ( ( lat * ( height/ 2 ) ) / ( tgc::Pi/ 2) ); 
00118                 m_points.append( QPoint( x, y ) );
00119         
00120         }
00121         update();
00122 }
00123 
00124 void WorldMap::paintEvent(QPaintEvent* /*event*/ )
00125 {
00126         QPainter painter( this );
00127         painter.setPen( QPen( Qt::darkGreen, 2, Qt::SolidLine, Qt::RoundCap ) );
00128         //painter.setBrush( QBrush( Qt::darkGreen, Qt::SolidPattern ) );
00129         
00130         if( m_points.size() > 0 )
00131         {
00132                         
00133 
00134                 QImage alpha( m_map.width(), m_map.height(), QImage::Format_RGB32 );
00135                 
00136                 QImage copy( m_map.width(), m_map.height(), QImage::Format_RGB32 );
00137                 for( int x = 0; x< m_map.width(); x++ )
00138                 {
00139                         for( int y1 = 0; y1 < m_points[x].y(); y1++ )
00140                         {
00141                                 QColor color = QColor::fromRgb ( m_map.pixel( x, y1 ) );
00142                                 QColor pixelColor;
00143                                 if( m_declination > 0 ) pixelColor = color.lighter ( 110 );
00144                                 else pixelColor = color.lighter ( 70 );
00145                                 copy.setPixel( x, y1, pixelColor.rgb() );
00146                         }
00147                         for( int y2 = m_points[x].y(); y2 < m_map.height(); y2++ )
00148                         {
00149                                 QColor color = QColor::fromRgb ( m_map.pixel( x, y2 ) );
00150                                 QColor pixelColor;
00151                                 if( m_declination < 0 ) pixelColor = color.lighter ( 110 );
00152                                 else    pixelColor = color.lighter ( 70 );
00153                                 copy.setPixel( x, y2, pixelColor.rgb() );
00154                         }
00155                         
00156                 }
00157                 
00158                 painter.drawImage(0, 0, copy );
00159         
00160                 QVector< QPoint > points;
00161                 points.append( m_points[0] );
00162                 for( int index = 0; index < m_points.size()-1; index++ )
00163                 {
00164                         points.append( m_points[index] );
00165                         points.append( m_points[index] );
00166                 }
00167                 points.append( m_points[m_points.size()-1] );
00168                 painter.drawLines( points );
00169                 
00170                 double x =      ( ( -m_hourAngle + tgc::Pi) * m_map.width() ) / tgc::TwoPi;
00171                 if( x < 0 )     x = m_map.width() + x;
00172                 double y =      (m_map.height()/ 2) + ( (-m_declination   * ( m_map.height()/ 2 ) )  / ( tgc::Pi / 2 ) );
00173                 painter.drawImage( x, y, m_sun );
00174                 
00175                 //Draw Text
00176                 painter.setPen( QPen( Qt::black, 2, Qt::SolidLine, Qt::RoundCap ) );
00177                 painter.setFont( QFont( "MS Shell Dlg 2", 8 ) );
00178                 QString azimuth = QString("Azimuth: %1").arg( QString::number( m_azimuth ) );
00179                 painter.drawText ( 20, 280, azimuth );
00180                 QString zenith = QString("Zenith: %1").arg( QString::number( m_zenith ) );
00181                 painter.drawText ( 20, 310, zenith );
00182                 QString ascension = QString("Right Ascension: %1").arg( QString::number( m_rightAscension ) );
00183                 painter.drawText ( 20, 340, ascension );
00184                 QString declination = QString("Declination: %1").arg( QString::number( m_declination ) );
00185                 painter.drawText ( 20, 370, declination );
00186          }
00187          else   painter.drawImage(0, 0, m_map);
00188          
00189         
00190  }
